Name: Xvart Speaker
Languages: Abyssal and one additional language (usually Common or Goblin)
Traits: Low Cunning. The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns. Overbearing Pack. The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated. Raxivort's Tongue. The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.
Actions: Shortsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Sling. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
